entry.title: LNHANCE bips and implementation
entry.summary: The email content focuses on a technical aspect related to Tapscript, specifically mentioning the functionality of IKEY. It explains that IKEY operates exclusively within the Tapscript environment. This is attributed to its method of reading the BIP341 internal key from the control block and subsequently writing this information onto the stack. The explanation provides insight into how IKEY functions as an integral component of Tapscript, highlighting its role in managing keys within this specific context.
